alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 4:00AM HST until December 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI MAUI AND KAHOOLAWE... .A cold front near Kauai will move southeast down the island chain later today and tonight. Strong winds will develop behind the front and will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Molokai, Lanai, Maui and Kahoolawe. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusts can make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
